Text: Need address for your tax organizer please Cc PST Hi Chris I will have Tamara Utsch reply to you on your refund I believe she updated you last week but well see if theres new news this week Can you please send me your current home address so we can send you an organizer Thanks Judy Perdomo PricewaterhouseCoopers Calgary International Assignment Solutions Fax ChrisDorland enroncom To Judith L mericasCA cc Subject RE Preparation of tax returns AM Judy Thanx I will get my info together and get it to you asap Any info on my US tax return I am still owed approx USD from uncle sam Chris Original Message From ENRON Sent Monday February AM To Dorland Chris Cc Subject RE Preparation of tax returns Hi Chris We would be happy to prepare your returns My understanding is that you moved back from Texas to Canada in so you will require both a US return and a part year Canadian return Our fee for this service is Cdn funds GST Please provide your current address home phone number etc so we can add you to our list and send you an organizer Kind regards Judy Perdomo PricewaterhouseCoopers Calgary International Assignment Solutions Fax Forwarded by Judith L PerdomoCATLSPwC on AM Tamara L Utsch To Judith L mericasCA cc Subject RE IRS refundupdate PM FYI Tamara L Utsch International Assignment Solutions PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP Calgary Forwarded by Tamara L UtschCATLSPwC on PM ChrisDorland enroncom To Tamara L mericasCA cc Subject RE IRS refundupdate PM Tamara Any updates on my IRS refund Also I need a contact for my returns As I will now be working for UBS I will probably be paying privately to have my return done but I would still like PWC to do both my US and Canadian returns for Please advise Chris Dorland Original Message From ENRON Sent Tuesday December PM To Dorland Chris Cc Subject IRS refundupdate Hi Chris I followed up with the same IRS representative I spoke with in November regarding your missing cheque I wish I had better news for the holiday season Three traces were placed on your missing refund cheque and three times the trace has been rejected The IRS doesnt know why They are placing a formal inquiry into the matter The representative I spoke with has admitted that somebody on the IRS end isnt doing what they are supposed to be doing and he promised me theyd get down to the matter I can only tell you that I will follow up again in January of the new year In the meantime have a very Merry Holiday Season and a Wonderful New Year Best regards Tamara L Utsch International Assignment Solutions PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP Calgary The RE Cc PST Hi Chris No word on your refund Tamara is going to follow up again with the IRS in the next couple of weeks Meanwhile if it appears please let us know Kind regards Judy Perdomo PricewaterhouseCoopers Calgary International Assignment Solutions Fax The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer

Dinas tax returns Cc Dear John Dinas returns are leaving our offices today by courier so you should have them tomorrow The only year for which there is an amount owing is including interest and penalties the total is US Please contact Laurie Pare or myself if you have any questions or concerns Best regards Judy Perdomo PricewaterhouseCoopers Calgary International Assignment Solutions Fax The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer

RE Tax Advise Barry TycholizBarry We normally charge Enron for departure counselling and it involves an interview of about hours in which we discuss residency US tax considerations etc Please let me know when you would like to schedule the meeting Best regards Judy Wood Perdomo PricewaterhouseCoopers Calgary IAS Department Fax Tycholiz Barry To Judith L mericasCA BarryTycholiz cc ENRONcom Subject RE Tax Advise Barry Tycholiz AM Thanks for the reply It would be my expectation that Enron will pay but I will look into this and get back to you What do you think the cost will be BT Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday July AM To Cc Tycholiz Barry Subject Re Tax Advise Barry Tycholiz Good morning Barry Id be happy to provide you with assistance in this regard Will Enron be paying for this service Please let me know when it would be convenient for you to meet I am assuming this will be over the phone Best regards Judy Wood Perdomo PricewaterhouseCoopers Calgary IAS Department Fax Barry Kim Tycholiz To Judith L mericasCA oust cc onrrcom Subject Tax Advise Barry Tycholiz PM Judy you wereassigned to my US and Canadian tax returns I am a employee of Enron North America and previously was an employee of Enron Canada in Calgary As we had discussed at the time of my filing I was never given any advise on my relocation to the US regarding tax issues As such I am not sure what some of my next moves should beI very much require some assistanceregarding spousal employment My wife is a registered nurse and would like to work in the US but I have been advised that this may affect my filing in the US and perhaps could cost me more in US Taxes Can we set up a meeting to discuss strategies on making sure I am going about this properly This is my home email address you can contact me here or at my work address Thanks in advance BT The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received CounsellingGood morning Barry Just to let you know that I am on holidays August so your counselling will have to be this week or when I return Did Enron provide you with approval for a Post Arrival ConsultationPAC This is the counselling our PwC Houston office does So in effect there are two possible counselling sessions for assignees the predeparture counselling you are supposed to receive before you depart Canada and then theres the PAC PwC Houston is prepared to set up the PAC they simply want to know if you received approval for it Thanks Judy Perdomo PricewaterhouseCoopers Calgary International Assignment Solutions Fax The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer

RE CounsellingHi Im back Please fax the IRS notice to me at the number below if you havent already and Ill review it for you Regarding the counselling session I am available tomorrow all day Wednesday afternoon after pm Thursday afternoon after pm and Friday after pm Next week Ill be out of the office Tuesday and Wednesday as well as Thursday afternoon The next week I am out of the office on a course all week Sept Will any of these time slots work for you Judy Perdomo PricewaterhouseCoopers Calgary International Assignment Solutions Fax Tycholiz Barry To Judith L mericasCA BarryTycholiz cc ENRONcom Subject RE Counselling AM Send me a note when you get back and we can set up a meeting then Also I received a notice from the IRS and it appears that they were missing information on my wife and as such disallowed me claiming her as a dependent I will send to your attention to review and clarify Based on my filing and actual refund there is about a k difference which I believe is owed to me BT Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday August AM To Tycholiz Barry Subject Counselling Good morning Barry Just to let you know that I am on holidays August so your counselling will have to be Follow upHi Barry I have sent to you in the mail an article regarding the situation with your stock account at TD Our best advice is to probably close out the account per TD and do online trading if that suits you or move the funds to the US Re the cottage in Riding Mountain go ahead Two things it isnt useable in the winter so its not available for your use and the second thing is that you are going to be purchasing it AFTER youve become a nonresident Amex Card probably isnt a huge issue to use the Canadian one but it is a tie Please call with any further enquiries or for clarification Best regards Judy Perdomo PricewaterhouseCoopers Calgary International Assignment Solutions Fax The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer
